- [93mOrganosulfur[0m-[93mRich[0m [93mPorous[0m [93mCarbon[0m [93mCathode[0m [93mEnables[0m [93mSoluble[0m-[93mPolysulfide[0m-[93mFree[0m and [93mHigh[0m-[93mRate[0m [93mPotassium[0m-[93mSulfur[0m [93mBatteries[0m.: [93mPotassium[0m-[93msulfur[0m ([93mK[0m-[93mS[0m) [93mbatteries[0m are [93memerging[0m as [93mone[0m of the [93mmost[0m [93mpromising[0m [93mcandidates[0m for [93mnext[0m-[93mgeneration[0m [93menergy[0m [93mstorage[0m, [93mowing[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mhigh[0m [93menergy[0m [93mdensity[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93msevere[0m [93mpolysulfide[0m [93mshuttle[0m [93meffect[0m and [93msluggish[0m [93mredox[0m [93mkinetics[0m of [93msulfur[0m [93mcathodes[0m [93mremain[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mbarriers[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mapplication[0m. [93mHerein[0m, a [93mclass[0m of [93morganosulfur[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mporous[0m [93mcarbon[0m ([93mOSPC[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mdeveloped[0m as a [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mcathode[0m for [93msoluble[0m-[93mpolysulfide[0m-[93mfree[0m and [93mhigh[0m-[93mrate[0m [93mK[0m-[93mS[0m [93mbatteries[0m. - [93mNovel[0m [93mSm[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mFeTiO[0m([93m3[0m)/[93mWO[0m([93m3[0m) [93mZ[0m-[93mscheme[0m [93mheterojunction[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mdegradation[0m of [93mtetracycline[0m [93mhydrochloride[0m.: As an [93miron[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mphotocatalytic[0m [93mmaterial[0m, [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m [93mhas[0m [93mbecome[0m an [93mimportant[0m [93msemiconductor[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mdue[0m to its [93mexcellent[0m [93mstability[0m and [93mvisible[0m [93mlight[0m [93mabsorption[0m [93mcapabilities[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m of [93mpure[0m [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m is [93mnotably[0m [93mhindered[0m by the [93mfast[0m [93mrecombination[0m of [93mphotogenerated[0m [93mcharges[0m and its [93minsufficient[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mstrength[0m. - [93mMitigation[0m [93mPotential[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mfabricated[0m [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m on [93marsenic[0m [93minduced[0m [93mstress[0m in [93mmorpho[0m-[93mphysiological[0m [93mgrowth[0m of [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m.: [93mArsenic[0m (As) is a [93mhighly[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93mmetalloid[0m that [93mpresents[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mhazard[0m. [93mExtensive[0m [93mcontamination[0m of [93magricultural[0m [93msoils[0m by As is a [93mglobal[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mnecessitating[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93meffective[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93mefficient[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mmitigate[0m its [93mimpact[0m on [93mfood[0m [93msafety[0m. [93mAlthough[0m [93mselenium[0m ([93mSe[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mrecognized[0m for its [93mantagonistic[0m [93minteractions[0m with As, the [93mpotential[0m of [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mSeNPs[0m) in [93mmitigating[0m As [93mtoxicity[0m [93mremains[0m [93munderexplored[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mbiocompatible[0m [93mSeNPs[0m were [93msynthesized[0m [93mvia[0m a [93mgreen[0m [93mapproach[0m [93musing[0m [93mVitis[0m [93mvinifera[0m [93mraisin[0m [93mextract[0m and [93mapplied[0m to [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m ([93mHUR[0m-[93m105[0m) through [93mpriming[0m, [93mco[0m-[93mapplication[0m, and [93mfoliar[0m [93mspraying[0m under As [93mstress[0m. [93mArsenic[0m [93mexposure[0m [93msignificantly[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m01[0m) [93mimpaired[0m [93mseedling[0m [93mgrowth[0m by [93mdisturbing[0m [93mnutrient[0m [93mhomeostasis[0m, [93mreducing[0m [93mchlorophyll[0m [93mbiosynthesis[0m, and [93mweakening[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mstability[0m. [93mApplication[0m of [93mSeNPs[0m, [93mparticularly[0m at [93m25[0m [93mμM[0m [93mfoliar[0m [93mconcentration[0m, [93msubstantially[0m [93malleviated[0m these [93meffects[0m by [93menhancing[0m [93mantioxidant[0m [93menzyme[0m [93mactivity[0m, [93mstimulating[0m [93msecondary[0m [93mmetabolite[0m [93mproduction[0m, and [93mimproving[0m [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mefficiency[0m. [93mBiochemical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mpronounced[0m [93mincreases[0m in [93mchlorophyll[0m ([93m50[0m%), [93mcarbohydrate[0m ([93m45[0m%), [93msoluble[0m [93mprotein[0m ([93m48[0m%), and [93mfree[0m [93mamino[0m [93macid[0m ([93m44[0m%) [93mcontents[0m, [93malongside[0m a [93m38[0m% [93menhancement[0m in [93mmembrane[0m [93mstability[0m [93mindex[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mindicate[0m that [93mSeNPs[0m [93mserves[0m as an [93meffective[0m [93mreactive[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mspecies[0m ([93mROS[0m) [93mquencher[0m, [93mmitigates[0m As-[93minduced[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mdamage[0m by [93mreinforcing[0m [93mredox[0m [93mhomeostasis[0m and [93mmetabolic[0m [93mactivity[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93munderscores[0m the [93mpotential[0m of [93mSeNPs[0m as a [93mnanotechnological[0m [93mintervention[0m to [93menhance[0m [93mstress[0m [93mresilience[0m in [93mrice[0m, while [93mhighlighting[0m the [93mnecessity[0m of [93mfield[0m-[93mscale[0m [93mevaluations[0m to [93mestablish[0m [93mdose[0m [93moptimization[0m and [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mapplicability[0m under [93mvariable[0m As [93mconditions[0m.
